group_1.textLeft: That was a lovely tea break.@I enjoyed it a lot.
Thank you for indulging me, you two.[chara:200501:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]

group_1.textRight: There is no need for thanks.
For sure!@We had a great time too.
Though, it feels like it was just us@doing all the talking...

group_1.textLeft: Well then,[chara:200501:motion_200] shall we have our fight?

group_1.textRight: Fight?@...[chara:300801:motion_0:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Oh, yeah, that...!
Uh...@[chara:300801:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:300801:lipSynch_1:motion_0:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]Could we maybe take a rain check?
Hm?
I found out just how good of @a friend Nanaka is to me, andâ€¦
I dunno...feels like that's enough for today.
I just want her to know that we appreciate@that she helped us realize that and all...
Yes...@That goes for me too...
This was a marvelous opportunity to@evaluate Akira's kindness and strength.
But I don't think there is a connection...

group_1.textLeft: The two of you have great friends and trust@each other.
I do not think blindly adding new teammates@will always end in improvement.

group_1.textRight: ...Hm.@[chara:300501:motion_100:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json]That makes sense.

group_1.textLeft: I don't mind helping you out, though.
If you need my help... I'll be there,@even if I have to come from Mitakihara.

group_1.textRight: Huh?![chara:300801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]

group_1.textLeft: Akira...@[chara:200501:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]You would do no less, wouldn't you?

group_1.textRight: Mm...@...[chara:300801:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]Hehe.

group_1.textLeft: And if you'd like to fight me,@I'll be happy to oblige.
I couldn't accept your offer before@because I knew nothing about you...
Now that I have seen what the two of you@are like, I feel like we could work together.

group_1.textRight: So that was your reasoning...@For having us drink tea with you?
I must say...@[chara:300501:motion_1:cheek_-1:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json]I'm very impressed with your strategizing.
I look forward to our collaborative efforts.
Great, we did it! We got the @strongest Magical Girl on our side!

group_1.textLeft: Next time I visit Kamihama City, would@you care to have tea together again?

group_1.textRight: Yes!
...That would be most agreeable.

group_1.textLeft: I'm glad. Well, then, I should get going...@I have to get back to Mitakihara.

group_1.textRight: I see.
In that case, I will practice hard@in preparation for our next meeting.
I'll look forward [chara:300501:motion_100]to fighting you then.
Yeah, me too!@[chara:300801:lipSynch_0][freeze:0.5][chara:300801:motion_100:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json:lipSynch_1]I can't wait!
Yes.
Until next time![chara:300801:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]

group_1.narration: Kamihama City...@A place where abnormal things happen.
At least the Magical Girls who live@there are just normal, average girls.
The kind of girls I could make friends with.

group_1.textCenter: I'll have to tell Madoka and the@others when I get back to Mitakihara.
They'll want to know all about those two...
